name: The Cooler Skool
description:
WARNING: this game is a very bad horror game. if you get scared of a thread falling on the floor, you will be scared of this game.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

escape the skool before you cant...

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

clicking/tapping. click the restart wheel to start the game over, and press the square to stop the game.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

this game is very bad, and the ways to beat it are stupid.
